data.sampled: : This is a combination of selling a put and buying a put to create a synthetic long position in the underlying asset, and simultaneously selling a call and buying a call to create a synthetic short position in the same underlying asset. The strategy is known as a debit spread, and specifically a bear call spread.<|im_end|>
